# index

**Instance Property**

The system interface index associated with the interface.

## Declaration

```swift
var index: Int { get }
```

## Inspecting Interfaces

- **type**: The type of the interface, such as Wi-Fi or loopback.
- **NWInterface.InterfaceType**: Types of network interfaces, based on their link layer media types.
- **name**: The name of the interface.
